RVNL Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Chief Project Manager Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 14, 2025, 15:24 IST
 Rail Vikas Nigam Limited
 1 Jobs |  Posted On : 14-Aug-2025 |  Delhi |  Salary : 120,000 to 280,000




FOLLOW

The Rail Vikas Nigam Limited (RVNL) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Chief Project Manager Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech in Civil Engineering can apply for the RVNL Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process,  application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Delhi.

RVNL Recruitment 2025 Eligiblity Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Chief Project Manager	01	B.E./B. Tech in Civil Engineering

RVNL Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 21 Years.
The maximum age limit: 58 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organization's norms.

RVNL Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the

Written test.
Interview.

RVNL Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

There is no application fee.

RVNL Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The minimum salary: Rs. 1,20,000/- per month.
The maximum salary: Rs. 2,80,000/- per month.
How to Apply for the RVNL Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the RVNL Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligiblity criteria.
Download the application form.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Submit the filled application form to the mentioned e-mail address.
Take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

E-mail Address:

rvnl.deputation@rvnl.org.

Important Dates:

Starting date	13-08-2025
Closing date	12-09-2025

 

Official Notification and Application Form	Click Here

Join on Telegram	Join Now
